com.soa.console.activity.render

Interface ActivityRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractActivityRenderer

    public interface ActivityRenderer
    Interface the activity UI framework will call when inserting and editing an activity of a particular type.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getInternalName

        javax.xml.namespace.QName getInternalName()
        Gets the unique internal name of the activity type as a QName.
        Returns:
        the internal name

      • getActivityType

        java.lang.String getActivityType()
        Gets the activity type. This type is used as a key by the framework when looking for a renderer for an activity.
        Returns:
        the activity type

      • getContentLocation

        java.lang.String getContentLocation()
        Gets the location of the web page content.
        Returns:
        the content location

        java.lang.String getIcon(java.util.Locale locale)
        Gets the icon for the activity. The icon may be locale specific so a locale is provided.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale
        Returns:
        the icon
